scenarios.name: A Town in Flames
rewards: Gain 2 + X morale, where X is the number of City Guards still on the map.

scenarios.name: Crystal Trench
rewards: Gain 1 collective Lumber and 2 collective Hides

scenarios.name: Jagged Shoals
rewards: Choose one: Unlock Coral class OR Unlock Sea Weed class box.
Gain “Coral Shard” and “Shard Seeker” campaign stickers.
Add event WO-81 to the winter outpost deck.

scenarios.name: Ice Floes
rewards: Lose 1 collective Lumber for each set of five hexes with water tiles on tile 7-G

scenarios.name: Corrupted Camp
rewards: lose 1 inspiration, +2 loot cards for each charactor

scenarios.name: Relief Effort
rewards: lose 1 inspiration, +2 loot cards for each charactor

scenarios.name: Change of Heart
rewards: 2 morale, Gain 2 prosperity, unlock fist or snowflake, “friend of frostspeakers” sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: Call of the Harbinger
rewards: 1 morale, 1 inspiration, unlock fist class, “Friend of Icespeakers” sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: Sanctuary of Snow
rewards: 1 morale, 1 inspiration, unlock snowflake class, “Friend of Icespeakers” sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: Orphan's Core
rewards: 1 morale, “Key Card” (item 246), 3 lumber, 3 metal, 3 hides, prism class, “unfettered deacivation” sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: Automation Uprising
rewards: 2 morale, Gain 2 prosperity, gain “Key Card” (item 246), prism class, “unfettered allies” sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: Uniting the Crown
rewards: 2 morale, Gain 1 prosperity, 30xp, Unlock Coral class OR Sea Weed class, Crown reunited sticker, +50 card to town guard deck

scenarios.name: The Face of Torment
rewards: (3 weeks) 50 gold each for enhancements, if building 44 is built

scenarios.name: Flotsam
rewards: 3 wood + optional friend of the fish king sticker

scenarios.name: Expedition North
rewards: Gain 2 prosperity+3 forgotten cirlces items (153,159,161) OR ???

scenarios.name: Frozen Treasure
rewards: check, 10 gold per numbered token looted, lose 10 gold or 5 gold + muddle & curse

scenarios.name: Sinking Ship
rewards: lose 2.5 loot per charactor, HE-RO-IC-S pet after 1 week if building 88 is built

scenarios.name: My Private Empire
rewards: gain 1 material resource per completed episode OR gain 5 + “Cup of Ventillion” (item 214)

scenarios.name: Caravan Guards
rewards: based on success level: 1 morale, 1 lumber, 1 metal, 1 hide, 2 material resources each, 10xp, Gain one random item blueprint, Gain 1 prosperity, 2 morale

scenarios.name: Lurker Necromancy
rewards: “Amulet of Eternal Life” (Item 66), loot cards for each token

scenarios.name: Radiant Dust
rewards: trade in “dust” for “Scepter of Control” (item 203) &/or a material resource &/or herb resource

scenarios.name: Derelict Freighter
rewards: based on # of crates looted: 10 gold, 2 lumber, “Tri-Corner Hat” (item 195), Gain 1 prosperity

scenarios.name: A Tall Drunken Tale
rewards: 1 morale OR 2 morale OR 3 morale + “Befuddling Mug” (item 215)

scenarios.name: And Then, a Stream
rewards: lose 3 morale, gain Gain 1 prosperity, 10 gold OR 5 collective gold per token carried

scenarios.name: Pirate Queen's Haul
rewards: Gain 2 prosperity, 3 morale, 30 gold each, upgrade a money loot with a +1

levels.wrecked: Disadvantage on all attack event resolutions. Cannot use soldiers.
